title: Jozef
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

|   | A tall bounty hunter. |

## Useful Info

**Jozef** was a fairly ordinary [human](/Human_\(monster\) "Human (monster)") [unique](/Unique "Unique"), often generating with a moderately powerful melee weapon and an assortment of annoying spells, and occasionally with [throwing nets](/Throwing_net "Throwing net") or a [sling](/Sling "Sling"). He could be found in [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair") or the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls").

Spells: [Teleport Other](/Teleport_Other "Teleport Other"), Healing, [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt"), [Slow](/Slow "Slow").

## Tips & Tricks

- While not particularly lethal in his own right Jozef can be incredibly annoying. He has a habit of slowing and poisoning you, then teleporting you into some exciting new death trap. Try to engage him on a cleared level where others won't interfere.

## History

Jozef was removed in [0.11](/0.11 "0.11").

From CrawlWiki

Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Jozef @ 
HP 90
HD 11
XP 1900
Speed 10
AC 0
EV 9
Will -5
Attack1 18 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat land
Intelligence Normal
Uses Weapons & armour
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags Unique
Fighter
Spellcaster
Actual spells
Warm-blooded
Speaks
A tall bounty hunter.

Useful Info

Jozef was a fairly ordinary human unique, often generating with a moderately powerful melee weapon and an assortment of annoying spells, and occasionally with throwing nets or a sling. He could be found in the Lair or the Elven Halls.

Spells: Teleport Other, Healing, Venom Bolt, Slow.

Tips & Tricks

  • While not particularly lethal in his own right Jozef can be incredibly annoying. He has a habit of slowing and poisoning you, then teleporting you into some exciting new death trap. Try to engage him on a cleared level where others won't interfere.

History

Jozef was removed in 0.11.
